reviews.comment: Excellent application. User friendly.  Well organized. Love the audio option very clear. A real pocket bible
reviews.author: Roy Bou Malhab

reviews.title: It\'s really great
reviews.comment: I did love this application it\'s really amazing I know it\'s to much effort to make somthing like that God bless you and I wish you will continue by the rest of voice files very soon

reviews.comment: I tried to install , i got that the app will be downloaded to your device shortly , and nothing happened

reviews.title: Thks a lottttttt
reviews.comment: Thanks a lot, u hv no idea how much I thank you. I\'ve been looking for a Bible app  with the option of listening. Jesus bless u :)))) Glory to Jesus, Glory to God!!!!

reviews.title: very Helpfull
reviews.comment: Thanks for helping others to get blessing from your free Holy downloads so easy and powerfull software GBU ALL------------  Adly Iskandar

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: The best app ever. ..... but it would be perfect if you provided a full package audio download add-on. Plz. =)
reviews.author: Andrew Adel

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.comment: This application is great! All the holy book in audio & readable!! That was my first time to use such an app. I am abroad for a while and couldn\'t bring a printed copy. Thanks a million for all who shared in such a great & useful app.
reviews.author: Sameh Khalil

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Great job guys, the best part is you can work it offline so you\'ll always have the holy bible text on your mobile.
reviews.author: Maissa Mazhar

reviews.comment: Love the high quality of this excellent work, may God our father richly bless you brothers.\tGreat job, many thanks.
reviews.author: N Batarseh

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Excellent bible edition. Easy to read. New testament has online audio files and can be downloaded for offline use. Will bring you peace and blessings from God.
reviews.author: Reem Jahshan

reviews.title: A must have app
reviews.comment: I am not sure if this application is optimised for Android, but it is a must have.  Please update the Arabic audio for the old testament. Downloading the audio is fairly slow, but maybe if having multiple mirror SERVERS, would speed it up. Again may the lord bless you and bless this work for the glory of his name.
reviews.author: Deya Rabadi

reviews.title: we love jesus
reviews.comment: amazing app!! everynight before i go to sleep i listen to the bible and its just amazing !!! love it and recommend it
reviews.author: casy za

reviews.title: THE BEST APP
reviews.comment: IM SUPER BUSY MOTHER OF FOUR, I DONT MEAN I DONT HAVE TIME TO SPEND WITH  MY LORD, BUT JUST BUSY WITH MY LITTLE ONES, TILL THEM GO TO BED IM BE LL BE SUPER TIRED,SO WHAT I DO IS THAT I LISTEN TO THE BIBLE AAAANNNNDDD  DO MY OTHER STUFF,  THIS APP IS OPEN FOR ME 24/7 I WHILE I CLEAN, DRIVE, FEED MY BABIES, CHECKING MY EMAILS ETC...  MAY THE LORD BLESS ALL OF YOU
